Contact me

Got a question? Feel free to send me an email or call anytime.

Services

I offer a range of professional services and can come to you at an additional cost. Choose from our existing menu, or get in touch for a quote.

Makeup

I can do your makeup for you or teach you how to do it yourself and provide advice on the right products for you. Bring your own lashes or I can supply them for you.

Bridal

Hair, makeup, tan and lashes, I have a package to suit. I can even take care of your bridesmaids and family. Book a trial and be confident you'll have the look you want on your big day.

Beauty

Lash extensions, eyebrow waxing and shaping, a spray tan or a blowdry and style. I can help you set the foundation for a great look. I can do it all from the comfort of your own home.

I am a professional mobile makeup artist located in Canberra. I specialise in wedding and event makeup, but I can also do special effects, festival and editorial makeup.
